item.title: 5 Minute Nacho Cheese Sauce
item.description: Ingredients 2 Tbsp butter 2 Tbsp flour 1 cup whole milk 6 oz. medium cheddar, shredded (about 1.5 cups) 1/4 tsp salt 1/4 tsp chili powder Directions Add the butter and flour to a small sauce pot. Heat and whisk the butter and flour together until they become bubbly and foamy. Continue to cook and whisk the bubbly mixture for about 60 seconds. Whisk the milk into the flour and butter mixture.
